title: Sustainable Production of Raw Materials from Waste Cooking Oils

Waste Cooking Oils (WCOs) were used as raw materials for sustainable production of chemicals. Techniques for fast recycling with minimal environmental impact (bentonite processing and water washing) were combined and...
